DOC.brief_summary: The aim prospective study explore pain-alleviating effect low-energy extracorporeal shock wave therapy ( ESWT ) patient chronic low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Radial Extracorporeal Shock Wave Therapy Chronic Low Back Pain : Prospective Controlled Study
DOC.detailed_description: 26 patient suffer persistent symptom 3 month go treat DOLORCLAST radial extracorporeal shock wave ( EMS , Swiss ) . Patients assign two group accord exist specific pain spot . Group I ( specific pain spot ) receive total 2000 impulses 2.5 Bar ; group II ( control , specific pain spot ) 4000 impulses 2.5 Bar . Patients go treat . The efficacy therapy go evaluate VAS scale treatment .
DOC.criteria: Symptom low back pain last 4 week Low back pain history 3 month Have low limb radiate pain beyond knee joint Spinal tumorous infectious disease , fracture , ankylose spondylitis , cauda equina syndrome severe spinal disease Spinal surgical history Severe heart , lung , liver , kidney disease high blood pressure With cardiac pacemaker Coagulopathy thrombosis Have ESW therapy pharmaceutical treatment low back pain last 1 month Mental illness none cooperation Pregnancy
